title: [NOVA 2025](https://novaparty.org/) releases
content: Another year, another NOVA party:
- [NOVA 2025 party results](collyviewer.html?collyname=Nova25_Results.txt&displaymode=ced)
- Retro32's ANSI compo winner: [The goggles, they do nothing](collyviewer.html?collyname=retro32-ansi.ans&font=80x25) *(Well done Karl!)*

- FuZioN's magnum opus of an ASCII release Textual Boogaloo: [compo version](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn-tboo-nova25.txt) and [final release](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn-tboo.txt) *(Your poor keyboard Darren!)*

title: Party time!
content: Added some missing party results to the site and tidied up the menu ordering.

title: One year later
content: We kinda blinked and missed 2024 with regards to site updates. But, as always, FuZioN carried on texting regardless:

- Added party results for [Decrunch 2024](collyviewer.html?collyname=Decrunch24-Results.txt&displaymode=ced), [Edison 2022](collyviewer.html?collyname=Edison_2022_Results.txt&displaymode=ced) and [Nova 2024](collyviewer.html?collyname=Nova24_Results.txt&displaymode=ced).

- Added [Metal-Impact-BBS-LoGO-PacK.ans](collyviewer.html?collyname=Metal-Impact-BBS-LoGO-PacK.ans), [fzn-flash-dance-party.txt](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn-flash-dance-party.txt&displaymode=ced), [R32BBS-Xmas-Logo-Pack.ans](collyviewer.html?collyname=R32BBS_Xmas_Logo_Pack.ans) and [R32-BBS-bABY.ans](collyviewer.html?collyname=R32-BBS-bABY.ans) releases.

title: Summer demoparty entries and site improvements
content: Added a new section for FuZioN's part-time job of producing party result files. Also made some minor front-end and back-end improvements to the site.

Our new ANSI releases are: [k33pin'-iT-oldskoOL](collyviewer.html?collyname=k33pin'-iT-oldskoOL.ans) (for [Nova 2023](https://novaparty.org/)) and [moto_pow3r](collyviewer.html?collyname=moto_pow3r.ans) (for [Evoke 2023](https://2023.evoke.eu/)).

title: What we're gonna do right here is go back!
content: Back to the E Werk for [Revision 2023](https://2023.revision-party.net/) and another [ASCII](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_bk_2_da_ewerk.txt&extendedcolumns=1&displaymode=ced) by FuZioN.

title: [SPAG 2](https://www.spagamiga.co.uk/) - "Electric Boogaloo!"
content: Textual [ASCII](collyviewer.html?collyname=SPAG2.txt&extendedcolumns=13&displaymode=ced) and [ANSI](collyviewer.html?collyname=SPAG2.ans) invitations to the second Stamford Peterborough Amiga Group meeting: [SPAG 2 - "Electric Boogaloo!"](https://www.spagamiga.co.uk/)

title: Jus' demosplashin'
content: An aquatic [ANSI](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_splash_party.ans) by FuZioN released at the [Demosplash](https://www.demosplash.org/) party in Pittsburgh, USA.

title: An ANSI for Europe and an ASCII for South America
content: FuZioN has been textmode globetrottin' again!

He did a complete [GeoMetric VecTor OverLoaD](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_geo_vector_overload.ans) in Germany at [Evoke](https://2022.evoke.eu/). Then roundhouse-kicked, [Da Kung Fu Afro Twins](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_kung_fu_afro_twins.txt&extendedcolumns=30&displaymode=ced) straight into Argentina for [Flashparty](https://flashparty.rebelion.digital/index.php?lang=en).
*Gets around a bit eh!*

title: A nocturnal South Devon ANSI joint at [NOVA 2022](https://novaparty.org/)
content: It was dark. It was late. *(Very late! Took over a month for me to get this on the site!)*
Here is FuZioN's [Midnight in Budleigh](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_midnight_in_bud.ans) ANSI entry for the [NOVA 2022](https://novaparty.org/) party held in August 2022.

title: Getting ANSI at [Edison 2022](https://edisonparty.com/)
content: Not Axl Rose, just ANSI prose! Another [ANSI colly](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_welcome_to_the_jungle.ans) by FuZioN for the [Edison 2022](https://edisonparty.com/) data jungle party.

title: Fresh ANSIs at [Revision 2022](https://2022.revision-party.net)
content: Witness a new [ANSI colly](collyviewer.html?collyname=fzn_ansi_logo_colly_1.ans) produced by FuZioN for [Revision 2022](https://2022.revision-party.net).

title: The dual colly site backlog update
content: A long overdue site update. Added FuZioN's [nkx-txt-art-4ever.txt](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_txt_art_4ever.txt&extendedcolumns=40&displaymode=ced) ASCII at [Flash Party 2021](https://flashparty.rebelion.digital) and [nkx-dline-reunited.ans](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_dline_reunited.ans) ANSI at [Deadline 2021](https://deadline.untergrund.net/2021/).

title: [TOGETHER](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_together.ans) (online) at [Revision 2021](https://2021.revision-party.net)
content: Revision 2021. It was that demoparty which got banned from Twitch halfway through the 64KB intro competition!
This time FuZioN mixed up both ANSI and Amiga ASCII styles for his [release](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_together.ans).

title: That weird time between Christmas and New Year!
content: You know the time.. Christmas has just happened, the New Year is a few days away and you have no clue what the actual day of the week is!

It's also a great time to get the neokortex site updated with our latest releases: the [fORNDATA x-MAS](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx_merry_fdata_xmas.ans) ASCII and the [NKXmastro 2o2o](https://code.obviousdisaster.dev/nkxmastro) (our first intro!) which were slung out in quick succession just before Christmas.

title: Rain at [Novoque](https://www.novoque.eu/)
content: Another party.. Another ANSI. FuZioN created [b1nary_ra1n](collyviewer.html?collyname=b1nary_ra1n.ans). Any references to 'The Matrix' are purely coincidental!

title: Double trouble at [Solskogen 2020](https://www.solskogen.no/)
content: We released a couple of entries at the final Solskogen party. FuZioN created a [farewell ANSI](collyviewer.html?collyname=goodbye_solskogen.ans) and Obvious Disaster went experimental in the logo competition by creating a real-time animated Solskogen logo. It's not a static image but it's not quite a demo. I'm calling it a [gfxtro](solskogen2020gfxtro) for now!

title: FuZioN dials into [NOVA 20](http://www.novaparty.org) with an old skool Amiga BBS themed [ANSI](collyviewer.html?collyname=nOVA-pARTY-nETWORK.ans) entry
content: BBS's eh! They were like the web but slower, and the graphics were blocky.. Hark back to that era with a look at FuZioN's tribute ANSI which won third place in the compo at Nova 2020.

title: FuZioN releases [ASCII](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-rev2o2o.txt&extendedcolumns=25&displaymode=ced) at [Revision Online 2020](https://2020.revision-party.net/)
content: COVID-19 couldn't stop Revision.. **It just moved online!** It also provided the opportunity for FuZioN to enter the ASCII competition with a remote entry.. **Which he did!**
The original version of this ASCII was over 1200 lines in length. Unfortunately, it needed to be trimmed down to 1000 lines to comply with the rules of the competition.

title: Minor update: Added a font switcher.
content: When viewing ASCII and ANSI releases on the site you can now change the display font. Available fonts are shown in the **Textviewer Font Changer** section of the left-hand navigation menu when you are viewing an ASCII or ANSI.

title: FuZioN goes [ANSI](collyviewer.html?collyname=DLine_GeoMetriX.ans.txt) at [Deadline 2019](https://deadline.untergrund.net/2019/)
content: Which is great! ..But we didn't know how to make it work 'nicely' on the site here. Thankfully, with a bit of head scratching and a lot of help from [AnsiLoveJS](http://ansilove.github.io/ansilove.js) I think we've solved it!

title: FuZioN releases his third [ASCII](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-evoke2o19.txt&displaymode=ced) at [Evoke 2019](https://2019.evoke.eu)
content: The only member of neokortex who releases anything *(..so far)* has released his third ASCII.

title: 31 seconds and we're gone for auto-sequence start
content: The new neokortex.co.uk has been launched! Welcome to the initial version of our new site.

title: FuZioN wins the [ASCII Votesheet](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-versus9-votesheet.txt&displaymode=ced) for Versus #9 competition at the [Edison 2019](https://edisonparty.com) demoparty
content: We're really proud to announce that FuZioN has entered an ASCII Votesheet competition.. **and won it!**

The competition was to design an ASCII votesheet for issue nine of the Amiga (and Android) diskmag Versus produced by [Nukleus](https://nukleus.nu) and Void. Our entry [nkx-versus9-votesheet.txt](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-versus9-votesheet.txt&displaymode=ced) was remotely submitted to the competition at the Edison 2019 demoparty held in Stockholm, Sweden. *(We should have been there!)*

title: FuZioN releases an [ASCII](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-nova19.txt&extendedcolumns=40&displaymode=ced) at the [NOVA 19](http://www.novaparty.org) demoparty
content: In an unprovoked burst of activity, FuZioN puts the rest of us to shame by actually creating a production and releasing it at a demoparty.

Our initial 'born-ascii-tro' (!) [N0VA_19.txt](collyviewer.html?collyname=nkx-nova19.txt&extendedcolumns=40&displaymode=ced) was released at the NOVA 19 party hosted in Budleigh Salterton, Devon on the south coast of England.
